content: This include statements relating to the achievement of certain milestones around the development and commercialization of the Aurora Driver on our anticipated timeframe, the timing of availability of autonomy-enabled truck platforms, the expected performance of our business and potential opportunities with partners and pilot customers, expected cash runway and overall future prospects. When the Aurora Driver is Feature Complete, we'll also provide quarterly a supplemental measure of the Aurora Driver's on road autonomy performance as an indicator of its progress in everyday driving scenarios.
